subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: As with Amar’e Stoudemire and Carmelo Anthony before him, this year Dwight Howard is the star player at the center of trade talks during the N.B.A.’s All-Star weekend.
snippet: As with Amar’e Stoudemire and Carmelo Anthony before him, this year Dwight Howard is the star player at the center of trade talks during the N.B.A.’s All-Star weekend.
